title: Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide stock market action on Friday
summary: Indian markets closed slightly higher on Thursday after recovering from sharp intraday losses. Buying resumed in the final hour amid optimism that US tariff hikes on Indian exports may have limited impact and potential diplomatic resolution.
fullContent: Indian markets closed slightly higher on Thursday after recovering from sharp intraday losses. Buying resumed in the final hour amid optimism that US tariff hikes on Indian exports may have limited impact and potential diplomatic resolution.

title: Cheniere’s Q2 Earnings Soar by 85% as LNG Demand and Prices Rise
summary: Cheniere Energy (NYSE: LNG), the biggest U.S. LNG exporter, booked an 85% higher net income for the second quarter from a year earlier amid strong demand for LNG and higher price margins of LNG cargoes delivered in 2025. Cheniere reported on Thursday a net income $1.
fullContent: Cheniere Energy (NYSE: LNG), the biggest U.S. LNG exporter, booked an 85% higher net income for the second quarter from a year earlier amid strong demand for LNG and higher price margins of LNG cargoes delivered in 2025. Cheniere reported on Thursday a net income $1.63 billion for the second quarter, an 85% surge from the $880 million income for the same period last year. Total revenues jumped by 43% to $4.64 billion, of which $4.5 billion was LNG revenues. Cheniere also announced it achieved this month substantial completion…

title: Fed’s Bostic Sees One Cut in 2025 as Tariff Effects May Persist
summary: Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he still views one interest-rate cut as likely this year, and reiterated there are reasons to be skeptical that the inflationary effects from tariffs will be temporary.
fullContent: Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he still views one interest-rate cut as likely this year, and reiterated there are reasons to be skeptical that the inflationary effects from tariffs will be temporary.
